Literature Review: Conspiracy theories have become a significant focus of research within the social and psychological sciences over the past two decades. These theories, which often attribute significant events or situations to secret plots by powerful actors, have profound implications for individual and collective behavior. This literature review aims to provide a comprehensive overview of the definitional aspects of conspiracy theories, their correlates, consequences, and communication dynamics.

References.title: Conspiracy Theories as Part of History: The Role of Societal Crisis Situations
